member.name: T:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Alert
member.summary: Displays contextual feedback messages for users.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Alert.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the alert.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Alert.IsDismissible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether a close icon should be displayed in the top right corner of the alert.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Alert.IsDismissed
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the alert has been dismissed by the user.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Alert.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the alert.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Alert.Dismissed
member.summary: Gets or sets the command that will be triggered when the alert is dismissed.

member.name: T:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Badge
member.summary: Renders a Bootstrap badge component.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Badge.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text inside the badge.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DotvvmBootstrapOptions.BootstrapCssUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the 'bootstrap.css' or 'bootstrap.min.css' file.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DotvvmBootstrapOptions.BootstrapJsUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the 'bootstrap.js' or 'bootstrap.min.js' file.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DotvvmBootstrapOptions.IncludeBootstrapResourcesInPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether DotVVM should include Bootstrap javascript and CSS files in the page automatically. Set this property to false if you have your own <script> and <link> elements in the page.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DotvvmBootstrapOptions.JQueryUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the jQuery library. This overrides the URL in the jquery DotVVM resource.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DotvvmBootstrapOptions.IncludeJQueryResourceInPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether DotVVM should include the jQuery script file in the page automatically.

member.name: T:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.LinkButton
member.summary: Extends the builtin LinkButton control to allow applying Bootstrap CSS classes to the link.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.LinkButton.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the button.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.LinkButton.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the button.

member.name: T:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.ResponsiveNavigation
member.summary: Renders a Bootstrap badge component. BootstrapItemsControl

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.ResponsiveNavigation.IsInverted
member.summary: Gets or sets if colors of ResponsiveNavigation are inverted.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.ResponsiveNavigation.HeaderText
member.summary: Gets or sets text that will be put in header. If HeaderImage is set this text will be used as alternate image text.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.ResponsiveNavigation.HeaderImageUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets image url that will be put in header. If HeaderText is set it will be used as alternate image text.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.ResponsiveNavigation.HeaderLinkUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets url which will be Header linked to.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.ResponsiveNavigation.FixedTo
member.summary: Gets or sets to which part of screen is ResponsiveNavigation fixed to.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.ResponsiveNavigation.IsFullWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets if ResponsiveNavigation will take the whole width of the screen.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.ResponsiveNavigation.RightAlignedItemsTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template items that will be aligned to left.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.ResponsiveNavigation.LeftAlignedItemsTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template items that will be aligned to right.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.ResponsiveNavigation.CollapseButtonTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template items that will be aligned to right.

member.summary: Base class for all bootstrap controls.

member.summary: This class wraps all bootstrap controls. By using this class bootstrap resources are automaticly loaded.

member.name: M:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.HtmlBootstrapControlBase.ConcatCssClasses(System.String[])
member.summary: Trims all classes and joins them with space.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.GridView.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the style of the table.

member.name: T:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl
member.summary: A base class for all Bootstrap controls with a collection of items.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl.TextBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets the value binding that points to a property which will be used as the text of the item.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl.NavigateUrlBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets the value binding that points to a property which will be navigated to when the item is clicked.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl.IsSelectedBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets a value binding that points to a property indicating whether the item is selected or not.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl.IsDisabledBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets a value binding that points to a property indicating whether the item is disabled or not.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl.ClickBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets a binding which defines a click action for button items.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl.Items
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of items that is used when no DataSource is set.

member.name: M:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl.OnLoad(DotVVM.Framework.Hosting.IDotvvmRequestContext)
member.summary: Occurs after the viewmodel is applied to the page and before the commands are executed.

member.summary: Occurs after the page commands are executed.

member.name: M:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl.DataBind
member.summary: Performs the data-binding and builds the controls inside the .

member.name: M:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl.CreateItem
member.summary: Creates the default item.

member.name: M:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl.RenderContents(DotVVM.Framework.Controls.IHtmlWriter,DotVVM.Framework.Hosting.IDotvvmRequestContext)
member.summary: Renders the contents inside the control begin and end tags.

member.name: M:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.BootstrapItemsControl.FinalizeRender(DotVVM.Framework.Controls.IHtmlWriter,DotVVM.Framework.Hosting.IDotvvmRequestContext)
member.summary: Called after rendering of inner elements is completed.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the transitions between the slides should be animated or not.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the dots indicating the current slide will be rendered.

member.summary: Gets or sets the template of the individual slides inside the control.

member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the "move right" button.

member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the "move left" control.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value binding that points to a property indicating whether the item is active or not.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value binding that points to a property that contains the URL of the image.

member.summary: Gets or sets the contents of the slide caption.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.CarouselItem.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the contents of the slide caption. HTML tags are allowed. If you want to use hardCoded caption use CaptionTemplate instead.

member.summary: Renders a DateTimePicker control which lets the user either to type the date, or select it from a calendar popup.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.SelectedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date selected in the control.

member.summary: Gets or sets format string that will be used to display the date.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.Mode

member.name: T:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Form

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the form - vertical, inline or horizontal.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Form.LabelSizeXS
member.summary: Gets or sets the XS size of the label area. This applies only to the Horizontal forms.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Form.LabelSizeSM
member.summary: Gets or sets the SM size of the label area. This applies only to the Horizontal forms.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Form.LabelSizeMD
member.summary: Gets or sets the MD size of the label area. This applies only to the Horizontal forms.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Form.LabelSizeLG
member.summary: Gets or sets the LG size of the label area. This applies only to the Horizontal forms.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Form.LabelSizeXL
member.summary: Gets or sets the XL size of the label area. This applies only to the Horizontal forms.

member.summary: Represents a group in the Form control.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.FormGroup.LabelText
member.summary: Gets or sets the label text. This property cannot be combined with the LabelTemplate property.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.FormGroup.LabelTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template of the label area. This property cannot be combined with the LabelText property.
